import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import {DataService} from "../data-access/data.service"; @Component({ selector: 'app-all-data', templateUrl: './all-data.component.html', styleUrls: ['./all-data.component.scss'] }) export class AllDataComponent { displayedColumns: string[] = ['Title', 'Company', 'Location', 'Type', 'Country', 'Level', 'Skills']; constructor(private readonly dataService: DataService) { } public allData$ = this.dataService.getAllData(); }
